SMOKED ROSEMARY NEGRONI ðŸ¥ƒ
â€¢
1 Rosemary sprig
30ml Kiss My Blackberries vermouth
30ml Gagliardo bitter
30ml Wild foraged gin
â€¢
Use a lighter to torch the tips of the rosemary sprig.
Set an Old Fashioned glass over the sprig.
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass.
Fill with ice, stir and strain into the smoked Old Fashioned glass.
Garnish with leftover charred rosemary.
â€¢
